quoteText: Notwithstanding the foregoing, if you have a Services account, such account can only be terminated by Intuitive Password if you materially breach this Agreement and fail to cure such breach within thirty (30) days from Intuitive Password' notice to you thereof
title: If you materially breach the terms of service, the service gives 30 days of notice before terminating your account

tosdr.case: The service gives 30 days of notice before closing your account
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state, "Intuitive Password may terminate your access to all or any part of the Website at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. If you wish to terminate this Agreement or your account (if you have one), you may simply discontinue using the Website. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if you have a Services account, such account can only be terminated by Intuitive Password if you materially breach this Agreement and fail to cure such breach within thirty (30) days from Intuitive Password' notice to you thereof; provided that, Intuitive Password can terminate the Website immediately as part of a general shut down of our service."
